Description:
Indulge without overdoing it? It?s possible, thanks to the thoroughly modern concept of small plates, here executed with an impeccable Italian focus.
Surrounded by exquisite d‚cor and gazing out over Bellagio fountain views, you?ll enjoy a singular experience perusing Chef Serrano?s menu of creative, signature flavors. Select from soups, salads, crostinis, focaccia and pizzettes, along with refreshing meat, seafood and vegetarian plates designed for sharing.

The dining room has floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows, ensuring LAGO has the most spectacular views of the resort?s iconic fountains ever experienced on The Strip. Adjacent to the dining room, an open-air patio offers waterfront seating centered on Lake Bellagio.

This new take on social dining is paired with a sophisticated mixology program that takes cocktail enthusiasts into uncharted but delicious territory
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
Bellagio welcomes Harvest by Roy Ellamar to Las Vegas. Chef Roy?s market-inspired menu is a breath of fresh air in Las Vegas, meeting the health-conscious demands of today?s travelers and diners while simultaneously delivering fresh, creative dishes that are full of flavor.
Chef Roy?s culinary philosophy was cultivated as a child where he was surrounded by farmers, foragers and fishermen, gaining a true appreciation for the provenance of ingredients and the relationship with the producers. Working at restaurants throughout Hawaii, Chicago, Beverly Hills ? and as executive chef of Sensi in Bellagio ? he has become a staunch advocate of local agriculture and sustainably produced proteins.

In a custom-designed space designed by award-winning architects Gensler & Associates, Harvest will treat guests to menu selections that include: charcuterie and artisanal cheeses and preserves; opulent vegetarian dishes; sustainable seafood cooked in a stone oven; grilled, dry-aged and grass-fed beef; organic poultry and game from the rotisserie; along with adventurous small bites, market-driven sides and a line-up of classic cocktails featuring cold-pressed juices and homegrown herbs.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
When you want a classic meal executed well, with fresh, mouth-watering ingredients, Fix has you covered. The restaurant?s wood-burning grill is an undeniable focus of the menu, turning out top-quality steak, chicken and tasty flatbreads. The varied menu also includes original small and shared plates such as lobster tacos, and "finger-licking" buffalo-style wings. Classic sides with a dash of decadence?like the Ultimate Very Adult Mac & Cheese?pair perfectly with excellent chops and seafood, as they do with our delicious salads.
A special "Pre-O Fix" menu provides ticket holders the ideal culinary complement to one of Cirque du Soleil's most popular shows, and an extensive wine list promises the perfect pairing to a flavorful dinner.

Located at the North Valet entrance, Fix provides easy access to a variety of nightlife options and serves as the epicenter for planning an outstanding night out at The Bellagio.

With Costa Rican wood interiors and an open-plan setting, Fix is a fabulous spot to people watch and be seen enjoying one of our most contemporary eateries
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
It?s as close as you can get to Japan on the Las Vegas Strip. Yellowtail Japanese Restaurant & Lounge's showcases innovative dishes from traditional and contemporary Japanese cuisine, and pairs them with an abundant selection of specialty sakes and panoramic views of Bellagio's iconic Fountains of Bellagio.
The centerpiece of this multi-sensory dining experience is award-winning Chef Akira Back's menu of authentic traditional and modern Japanese cuisine dishes, which includes seasonal fish and ingredients flown in daily from the finest markets and purveyors around the world, brought to your plate as sushi, sashimi, tempura, and hand rolls.

Yellowtail Japanese Restaurant & Lounge's expansive space and elegant wood and stone d‚cor foster a vibrant atmosphere for a memorable Las Vegas evening. A 25-by-13-foot bronze wall-mounted installation of the dorsal side of the yellowtail fish greets you at the entrance, as a hint of what?s to come.

In addition to traditional raw fish preparations, Chef Back creates a selection of innovative dishes inspired by his global travels and his time spent working with industry icons such as Nobu and Morimoto.

The restaurant?s hand-selected sake collection is extensive, encompassing the classic to the avant-garde and representing many prefectures from across Japan.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
"I think the role of a chef, is not just to cook, but to create cravings."
?Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten

Savor every rich detail. Award-winning, four-star celebrity chef and restaurateur Jean-Georges Vongerichten invites you to experience steakhouse dining at its finest. Savor prime steak, seafood and lamb accompanied by fabulous sauces, sides and meticulously selected wines. The setting for this most memorable culinary experience is a handsomely designed dining room by Michael DeSantis, dressed in deep chocolate brown and delicate Tiffany blue. Commissioned artwork by Carlo Maria Mariani, George Deem and Michael Gregory, as well as a water-themed canvas screen created by Joseph Raffael, adorn the walls and a garden patio provides the perfect outdoor setting for a serene dining experience.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Leave your misconceptions of buffet dining at the door, because The Buffet at Bellagio is an experience like no other in Las Vegas. Here, our talented chefs bring together the freshest ingredients and the best dishes from around the world, including Italian, Japanese, Chinese and American cuisines plus a whole lot more. Be wowed by the talent on display at our live-action cooking stations and take your taste buds on a journey of discovery as you sample favorite dishes and new temptations.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: The name is legendary. The experience unforgettable. Immerse yourself in the brilliant colors of this lakeside destination and prepare for a meal as bold and transcendent as your surroundings. Le Cirque's opulent dining room, designed by Adam D. Tihany, exudes celebration, setting the stage for an inimitable French menu that has drawn raves and accolades?including a perennial AAA Five Diamond Award rating and Forbes Travel Guide 5 Star Rating ?since the restaurant?s creation by Sirio Maccioni . A coveted wine list and attentive service complete an evening at Le Cirque?one that will remain in your memory for years to come.
Reapeat: Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
I've seen guests, they have four-courses of the quail, even for dessert! This is a true story.."
?Chef Julian Serrano

What could be more delightful for a pre-theatre meal or a decadent degustation menu experience than to dine in a AAA and Forbes Travel guide 5 Star Rating restaurant celebrating two beloved sons of Spain? Pablo Picasso?s renowned paintings and charming ceramic pieces grace the walls of Picasso, while the tables are laid with incredible dishes from Executive Chef Julian Serrano, inspired by the regional cuisine of Spain as well as France.

Picasso also boasts a wine cellar stocked with more than 1,500 selections from the finest European vineyards.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
"When you're born in Egypt you get 3 professions to choose from: doctor, lawyer, or engineer ?when I told my father I wanted to go to cooking school it was a little bit of a shock." ? Chef Michael Mina
Lucky for us, Michelin award-winning chef Michael Mina skipped the traditional occupations and built a culinary empire that includes his eponymous restaurant here at Bellagio. The sleek atmosphere is the perfect complement to Mina?s contemporary cuisine featuring innovative seafood preparations, vegetarian and seasonal dishes. Executive Chef Nick Sharpe, an emerging talent in his own right, brings Mina?s menu to life with a brilliant fusion of flavors. To further enhance an already exquisite dining experience, our Sommelier will recommend wine pairings from the extensive wine list, which features limited production American and European vineyard selections.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Enter this exquisite garden and lake-view destination and breathe in the exotic aroma of Cantonese, Szechwan and Hunan cuisine. Welcome to a Chinese restaurant that exceeds all expectations. At Jasmine, Nouvelle Hong Kong cuisine is accompanied by authentic and replicated Chinese art to create a transcendent dining experience that will arouse all senses.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: With authentic regional noodle dishes from all over Asia, Noodles offers a lunch or dinner experience featuring as much fun as flavor. Executive Chef Patrick Lee looks to the traditional dishes of Thailand, Japan, China and Vietnam, offering an impressive selection that includes Pad Thai, Laksa, Udon, soba, Singapore noodles, vermicelli and Pho. Old-time favorites?beef, chicken and fish plus vegetables?are also offered, served over steamed rice. The extensive menu extends even further to include barbecued and roasted dishes, seafood specialties, soups, congee and traditional Asian desserts
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: It's only fitting that our world-class AAA Five Diamond award-winning resort would have its own World Pastry Champion. The artistic genius of that champion, Chef Jean Philippe Maury, is showcased daily at his Jean-Philippe Patisserie. You'll be welcomed into this imaginative display by a breathtaking chocolate fountain. This floor-to-ceiling constructions of cascading melted chocolate is a fitting entr‚e to a wonderful world of carefully crafted chocolates, cookies, cakes, crepes, salads, sandwiches and more.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Petrossian opens every afternoon to share a bit of European flavor with guests in the form of a traditional Afternoon Tea Service from 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM. Come, sit and enjoy open-faced sandwiches, English tea sandwiches, freshly baked scones with clotted cream, Baxter's preserves, assorted miniature pastry delicacies and, of course, teas imported from around the world.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: With intricately detailed interiors reminiscent of the best European cafes, Caf‚ Bellagio welcomes guests into a light and airy space overlooking the resort?s Mediterranean-style pool and the flora of the Conservatory & Botanical Gardens. Open early & late, serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and late-night supper selections. Caf‚ Bellagio is a go-to for all of your beloved caf‚ favorites?served here with a delightful twist.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Need a quick bite? Then we suggest our most casual fare, including Caf‚ Gelato, Palio, Palio Pronto, Snacks at the Race & Sports Book or The Pool Caf‚. In addition, Bellagio is pleased to offer Cold-Pressed Juice at Caf‚ Gelato, Palio, and Snacks which is made without heat for maximum nutrition, taste and freshness.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Start your day right or take a break for an espresso, pastry or a more substantial snack in this delightful caf‚.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Bellagio Hotel, Las Vegas, NV 89109
